you can try a bottle builder job, which will test if the formula works properly. pass the pull request URL as an parameter

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder-elcapitan&build=200)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder-elcapitan/200/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder-elcapitan/200/
